metadata.description: Goal insights with supporting facts for interactive interface

insights.title: Exceptional High Values: SAMUEL L. JACKSON
insights.narrative: SAMUEL L. JACKSON demonstrates exceptionally high Movies Counts values in Person, Person, representing a significant positive outlier that stands apart from typical patterns.

supporting_facts.description: In the Bar showing Movie Counts across all categories in Person, SAMUEL L. JACKSON stands out with a value of 64.0, which is 2.4 standard deviations above the mean of 51.2.
In the Bar showing Movie Counts by Person, SAMUEL L. JACKSON has the highest value at 64.0, which is 25% above the average of 51.2.

insights.title: Relationship between Average Votes and Average Rating
insights.narrative: Average Votes and Average Rating show a moderate positive correlation (r=0.50), indicating they tend to move together. This suggests complementary dynamics between these measures.
